attributes.action: Make Vape supplies as essential as tobacco
attributes.additional_details: I like many others suffer from Respiratory health complications asto which vaping instead of smoking has kept me out of hospital,  Now I like many others are struggling to keep stocked up due to shop closures , We understand the benifits of lockdown to alleviate the struggles ok NHS but if ppl moved back to traditional tobacco we as a nation are going backwards and will put additional pressure on the NHS during these bad times
attributes.background: Us who vape for health reasons are being forced to go back to Traditional Tobacco products due to not being able to get supplies, Open vape shops on same grounds as tobaconists

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307865

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
